system.story: You manipulate a tiny object with your mind.

effect.before: You can grab or manipulate the target object with your mind, moving the object up to a number of squares equal to [[lookup formula="max(@R, @I, @P)" evaluate=true]]{your Reason, Intuition, or Presence score (your choice)}. You can use this ability to turn doorknobs, pull levers, and so forth. You can manipulate any small movable piece of a larger object as long as the piece is unattended and size 1T.
